This app demonstrates all parameters of `update_slider`:
1. `id` - The target slider's ID ("target_slider")
2. `label` - Updated through the "new_label" text input
3. `value` - Updated through the "new_value" numeric input
4. `min` - Updated through the "new_min" numeric input
5. `max` - Updated through the "new_max" numeric input
6. `step` - Updated through the "new_step" numeric input
7. `time_format` - Updated through the "time_format" text input (when using dates)
8. `timezone` - Updated through the "timezone" text input (when using dates)

The app includes:
- A target slider that will be updated
- Input controls for each parameter of `update_slider`
- A checkbox to toggle between numeric and date modes
- An update button to trigger the changes
- A text display showing the current slider value

Key features:
- Uses express mode syntax
- No external data files
- Minimal additional components
- Demonstrates both numeric and date slider functionality
- Shows all possible parameters of `update_slider`

The app allows you to:
1. Update the slider label
2. Change the slider value
3. Modify the min/max range
4. Adjust the step size
5. Switch between numeric and date modes
6. Customize date format and timezone when in date mode
